sentences.sContent: Behind the gray walls there are human sparks, and yet never a conflagration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Behind the gray walls there are human sparks, and yet never a conflagration.
sentences.sCn: 灰色的大墙后面仍有人性的火花，只是永远也不会燃成大火了。

sentences.sContent: But institute Pan teachs world of sad in conflagration decline, the handwritten note that Pan Jiao gives disappears in conflagration.
sentences.sContent_eng: But institute Pan teachs world of sad in conflagration decline, the handwritten note that Pan Jiao gives disappears in conflagration.
sentences.sCn: 但研究所潘教授在大火中不幸辞世，潘教授的手写笔记在大火中消失。

sentences.sContent: Introduce:Zong Tianbao holds a post the scientific garden conflagration of the member that convoy, his sacrifice oneself saved female researcher Gao Yu.

sentences.sCn: 简介：宗天保任职护卫员的科学园大火，他舍身救了女研究员高玉。

synos.tran: 大火；快速燃烧；突发；冲突

trans.tranOther: a very large fire that destroys a lot of buildings, forests etc
